mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT2014TsuchishoUchiwakeJoken" AS "joken" WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT2014TsuchishoUchiwakeJoken" AS "joken1" WHERE joken."uchiwakeJoken" = joken1."uchiwakeJoken" AND joken."fukaShoriKubun" = joken1."fukaShoriKubun" AND joken."hozonDateTime" < joken1."hozonDateTime" ) AND joken."fukaShoriKubun" = '0'

SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT2014TsuchishoUchiwakeJoken" AS "joken" WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT2014TsuchishoUchiwakeJoken" AS "joken1" WHERE joken."uchiwakeJoken" = joken1."uchiwakeJoken" AND joken."fukaShoriKubun" = joken1."fukaShoriKubun" AND joken."hozonDateTime" < joken1."hozonDateTime" ) AND joken."fukaShoriKubun" = '0' AND joken."uchiwakeJoken" = #{uchiwakeJoken}
